Class RecyclerAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecyclerAdaptor.ViewHolder>

  • public class RecyclerAdaptor
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecyclerAdaptor.ViewHolder>
    This class acts as adapter class for cart, items view This class extends RecyclerView
